TopicTitle: Proptool and prop orientation not the same as in game

Articles.Content:
In unity, when adding prop via proptool, the props aren't oriented like they are in KSP.

So what do I need to change so the props have the same orientation as in the game?

The props I'm placing are custom made.

On the object that exports your internal config (the parent of your prop objects) you want Z facing backwards. Bring the internal model into unity, place the props, them drag them onto the exporter object. The internal model and the props need to be aligned relative to their exporter objects.
